subject: Basketball (College)
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The Badgers survived a brief second-half cold spell before flogging the Buckeyes on their senior day, a spectacle that ended in the largest defeat of Ohio State’s season.
snippet: The Badgers survived a brief second-half cold spell before flogging the Buckeyes on their senior day, a spectacle that ended in the largest defeat of Ohio State’s season.
